title: Need a gift for a world traveler? This international mobile plan from aloSIM is under $20.
content:
Macworld

We live in a world with artificial intelligence, self-driving cars, and BTS. Wouldn’t you think we would have progressed beyond the need for archaic practices like international roaming charges by now? 

Not so. In fact, it’s still a huge moneymaker for cellular service providers, who stand to generate over $10 billion in roaming data revenue globally next year, up from $8.6 billion in 2023, according to Juniper Research.

You can beat that scam with the aloSIM Traveler’s Lifetime eSIM Plus Mobile Data Plan, a virtual free pass to securing wireless connectivity in over 170 countries worldwide when you travel. Your new data plan eliminates the need for running up huge international roaming charges or the hassle of trading out SIM cards.

Once you’ve purchased the voucher for aloSIM’s services, all you have to do is select one of their data packages that best suits your needs. Then, install the eSIM digital card on your compatible device just before you begin your international trip. 

Once you touch down at your destination, just activate the package and use your chosen device as normal. With data package prices as low as just $4.50 for a week of data, you can be covered for the entire length of your trip, no matter where you go. 

And while your data plan will run out after the specified timeframe, your lifetime eSIM never will, so you’re always ready to pick a new plan and use data at your pace whenever you’re set to travel.

eSIMs transfer easily to new phones, so you won’t have to buy a new one when you upgrade. 

“Much cheaper travel data than going through my carrier. Easy to use and got what I needed at a good price,” said one happy eSIMs user.

This aloSIM Traveler’s Lifetime eSIM Plus Mobile Data Plan offer includes the digital eSIM card and $50 in plan credit, now over half off at just $18.97 as part of this Black Friday sale. You can land this at one of the best prices of the year if you complete your purchase by Sun., Dec. 3.
